name: Ginityson.GitHub.io
body:
Virginia Tyson

3333 33rd Ave S

Minneapolis, Mn 55406

612-968-5058

Profile

Strongly self-motivated, creative individual with a passion for problem solving, projects, planning and people. A Big Picture Thinker with the ability to work collaboratively and meticulously attend to the fine details.

Professonal Experience

Overland Gallery, Mineapolis MN, 2002-2016

Art Exhibition Design and Installation for The Museum of Russian Art participating in 60 installations, leading the design and installation on 20 object bassed exhibits

  • Big picture thinking with ability to envision the completed installation, develop a plan to recieve and store objects, devise display solutions and incorporate and accommodate the curator's narrative
  • Excellent organizational and time management skills honed by typically tight installation times
  • Ability to analiyze, develop and implement creative solutions to problems
  • Understanding of how to work cooperatively with colleagues and with people in a team environment; and understanding of managing interactions with peers, colleagues, and superiors
  • Broad knowledge of the properties of works of art and their proper handleing through a variety of art objects such as tetiles, glass ornaments, stamps, photography,samovars, hundreds of Matryoshka dolls
  • Practical experience with exhibit case and mount constrction for exhibit installation
  • Experience with power tools and vitrine cleaning

Painting Conservation Technician with more than 10,000 hours experience

  • Documentation of painting or artifacts condition
  • Surface cleaning
  • Stabilization and consolidation of paint surface and supports
  • Experience with in-painting, mastery of color matching and manipulation of materials for cosmetic reintegration techniques

Art Handling

  • Responsible for ordering frames and fitting paintings in frames
  • Extensive experience handling and installing paintings and objcts in gallery, home and museum settings including The International Gallery of the Smithsonian and The Museum of Russian Icons in Massachusetts
  • Art packing and shipping

The Minneapolis Institute of Art, Minneapolis MN, 2001-2003

  • Gallery Guard

Education

  • Master of Fine Art, Painting Indiana State Univerity, 2000
  • Bachelor of Fine Art, Painting Minnesota State University, Moorhead, 1996
